children: . ‘‘Dveme
, bhikkhave, santhārā
. Katame dve? Āmisasanthāro ca dhammasanthāro ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve santhārā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ santhārānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammasanthāro’’ti.
innerText: 152. ‘‘Dveme , bhikkhave, santhārā [sandhārā (ka.)]. Katame dve? Āmisasanthāro ca dhammasanthāro ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve santhārā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ santhārānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammasanthāro’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dveme, bhikkhave, paṭisanthārā
. Katame dve? Āmisapaṭisanthāro ca dhammapaṭisanthāro ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paṭisanthārā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭisanthārānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapaṭisanthāro’’ti.
innerText: 153. ‘‘Dveme, bhikkhave, paṭisanthārā [paṭisandhārā (ka.)]. Katame dve? Āmisapaṭisanthāro ca dhammapaṭisanthāro ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paṭisanthārā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭisanthārānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapaṭisanthāro’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, esanā. Katamā dve? Āmisesanā ca dhammesanā ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve esanā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ esanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammesanā’’ti.
innerText: 154. ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, esanā. Katamā dve? Āmisesanā ca dhammesanā ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve esanā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ esanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammesanā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanā. Katamā dve? Āmisapariyesanā ca dhammapariyesanā ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve pariyesanā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pariyesanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapariyesanā’’ti.
innerText: 155. ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyesanā. Katamā dve? Āmisapariyesanā ca dhammapariyesanā ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve pariyesanā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pariyesanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapariyesanā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyeṭṭhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisapariyeṭṭhi ca dhammapariyeṭṭhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve pariyeṭṭhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pariyeṭṭhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapariyeṭṭhī’’ti.
innerText: 156. ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, pariyeṭṭhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisapariyeṭṭhi ca dhammapariyeṭṭhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve pariyeṭṭhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pariyeṭṭhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapariyeṭṭhī’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā
, bhikkhave, pūjā. Katamā dve? Āmisapūjā ca dhammapūjā ca. Imā kho bhikkhave, dve pūjā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pūjānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapūjā’’ti.
innerText: 157. ‘‘Dvemā , bhikkhave, pūjā. Katamā dve? Āmisapūjā ca dhammapūjā ca. Imā kho bhikkhave, dve pūjā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pūjānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammapūjā’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemāni, bhikkhave, ātitheyyāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisātitheyyañca dhammātitheyyañca
. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve ātitheyyāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ātitheyyānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammātitheyya’’nti.
innerText: 158. ‘‘Dvemāni, bhikkhave, ātitheyyāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisātitheyyañca dhammātitheyyañca . Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve ātitheyyāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ātitheyyānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammātitheyya’’nti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, iddhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisiddhi ca dhammiddhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve iddhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ iddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammiddhī’’ti.
innerText: 159. ‘‘Dvemā, bhikkhave, iddhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisiddhi ca dhammiddhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve iddhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ iddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammiddhī’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemā
, bhikkhave, vuddhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisavuddhi ca dhammavuddhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve vuddhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vuddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammavuddhī’’ti.
innerText: 160. ‘‘Dvemā , bhikkhave, vuddhiyo. Katamā dve? Āmisavuddhi ca dhammavuddhi ca. Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve vuddhiyo. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ vuddhīnaṃ yadidaṃ dhammavuddhī’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemāni
, bhikkhave, ratanāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisaratanañca dhammaratanañca. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve ratanāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ratanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammaratana’’nti.
innerText: 161. ‘‘Dvemāni , bhikkhave, ratanāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisaratanañca dhammaratanañca. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve ratanāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ratanānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammaratana’’nti.

children: . ‘‘Dveme, bhikkhave, sannicayā. Katame dve? Āmisasannicayo ca dhammasannicayo ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sannicayā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sannicayānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammasannicayo’’ti.
innerText: 162. ‘‘Dveme, bhikkhave, sannicayā. Katame dve? Āmisasannicayo ca dhammasannicayo ca. Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sannicayā. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sannicayānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammasannicayo’’ti.

children: . ‘‘Dvemāni, bhikkhave, vepullāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisavepullañca
dhammavepullañca. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve vepullāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vepullānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammavepulla’’nti.
innerText: 163. ‘‘Dvemāni, bhikkhave, vepullāni. Katamāni dve? Āmisavepullañca dhammavepullañca. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, dve vepullāni. Etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vepullānaṃ yadidaṃ dhammavepulla’’nti.
